title: Sin
verses: Romans 3:23 (WEB) — "For all have sinned, and fall short of the glory of God;"
Romans 6:23 (WEB) — "For the wages of sin is death, but the free gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord."
Isaiah 53:6 (WEB) — "All we like sheep have gone astray. Everyone has turned to his own way; and Yahweh has laid on him the iniquity of us all."
Romans 5:8 (WEB) — "But God commends his own love toward us, in that while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us."
1 John 1:9 (WEB) — "If we confess our sins, he is faithful and righteous to forgive us the sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness."
body: All have sinned—but grace abounds. Confession is the doorway to cleansing; the cross is the ground of our confidence. Run to the faithful Savior.
prayer: Merciful Father, I confess my sins and look to the cross of Christ. Wash me, renew me, and lead me in the way everlasting. Amen.
